column1: prajQApAramitA hRdaya sUtra om namaH BagavatyE Arya prajA pAramitAyE
column2: @45a / /rgya gar skad du /bha ga wa ti pradzny'a p'a ra mi ta hri da ya / bod skad du / bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po / bam po gcig go / bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo // 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //

column1: AryaH Avalokita ISvaraH boDisattvaH gamBIram prajQApAramitA AcAryAm caramANaH vyavalokayati sma
column2: yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa nyid la rnam par lta zhing /

column1: paQca skanDAH tAn ca svaBAva SUnyAn paSyati sma
column2: phung po lnga po de dag la yang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par lta'o // de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so // rigs kyi bu 'am / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des @45b ji ltar bslab par bya / de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis che dang ldan ba sha radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so / sh'a ri'i bu / rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des 'di ltar rnam par blta bar bya ste; phung po lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par yang dag par rjes su blta'o //

column1: iha SAriputra rUpam SUnyatA
column2: gzugs stong pa'o //

column1: SUnyatA eva rUpam
column2: stong pa nyid gzugs so //

column1: rUpAt na pRTak SUnyatA SUnyatAyAH na pRTak rUpam yat rUpam sA SUnyatA
column2: gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin; stong pa nyid las kyang gzugs gzhan ma yin no //

column1: yA SUnyatA tat rUpam evam eva vedanA saMjQA saMskAra avijQAnam
column2: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams stong pa'o //

column1: iha SAriputra sarva DarmAH SUnyatA lakzaNA
column2: sh'a ri'i bu; de lta bas na / chos thams cad stong pa nyid de / mtshan nyid med pa / ma skyes pa /

column1: anutpannAH anirudDAH amalAH avimalAH anUnAH aparipUrNAH
column2: ma 'gags pa / dri ma med pa / dri ma dang bral ba med pa / bri ba med pa / gang ba med pa'o; ;sh'a ri'i bu /

column1: tasmAt SAriputra SUnyatAyAm na rUpam
column2: de lta bas na / stong pa nyid la gzugs med /

column1: na vedanA na saMjQA na saMskArAH na vijQAnam
column2: tshor ba med / 'du shes med / 'du byed rnams med / rnam par shes pa med /

column1: na cakzuH Srotra GrANa jihvA kAya manAMsi
column2: mig med / rna ba med; sna med / lce med / lus med / yid med / gzugs med / sgra med / dri med /

column1: na rUpa Sabda ganDa rasa sprazwavya DarmAH
column2: ro med / reg bya med / chos med do //

column1: na cakzuH DAtuH yAvat na manaH vijQAna DAtuH
column2: mig gi khams med pa nas / yid kyi khams @46a *// med; yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang med do //

column1: na avidyA na avidyA kzayaH yAvat na jarA maraNam
column2: ma rig pa med // ma rig pa zad pa med pa nas / rga shi med /

column1: na jarA maraNa kzayaH na duHKa samudaya niroDa mArgA
column2: rga shi zad pa'i bar du yang med do // sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam med /

column1: na jQAnam na prAptiH na aprAptiH
column2: ye shes med / thob pa med / ma thob pa yang med do // sh'a ri'i bu /

column1: tasmAt SAriputra aprApti tvAt boDisattvaH
column2: de lta bas na / byang chub sems dpa' rnams thob pa med pa'i phyir /

column1: prajQApAramitAm ASritya viharati acitta AvaraNaH
column2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la brten cing gnas te /

column1: citta AvaraNa nAstitvAt atrastaH
column2: sems la sgrib pa med pas skrag pa med de /

column1: viparyAsa atikrAntaH nizWA nirvANaH
column2: phyin ci log las shin tu 'das nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin to //

column1: traDvavyavasTitAH sarva budDAH prajQApAramitAm ASritya anuttarAm
column2: dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas /

column1: samyaksamboDim aBisambudDAH
column2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs ba la brten nas / sangs rgyas so //

column1: tasmAt jQAtavyam prajQApAramitA mahA mantraH
column2: de ltar bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i la brten nas / sangs rgyas so //

column1: mahAvidyA mantra unuttara mantraH
column2: sngags / rig pa chen po'i sngags / bla na med pa'i sngags /

column1: sama sama mantraH sarva duHKa praSamanaH satyam amiTya tvAt
column2: mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i sngags / sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags / mi brdzun pas na bden par shes par bya ste /

column1: prajQApAramitAyAm uktaH mantraH tat yaTA
column2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags smras pa / tadya th'a / ga te ga te p'a ra ga te /

column1: om gate gate pAra gate pAra saMgate boDi svAhA
column2: p'a ra sam ga te / bo dhi sv'ah'a / sh'a ri'i bu / de @46b lta bas na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la bslab par bya'o // de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas / legs so // legs so; ;rigs kyi bu / de de bzhin no // rigs kyi bu / de de bzhin te / ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyad par bya ste / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rjes su yi rang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dva ti'i bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //

bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so //// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang / lotstsha ba dge slong rin chen sdes bsgyur cing / zhus chen gyi lotstsha ba dge blo dang / @47a *// nam mkha' la sogs pas zhus te gtan la phab pa /
